name: The Watcher (itch) (Nicolás Jaramillo Ortiz)
description:
Made for 4th Wall Broken 2023

The brave Green Knight has arrived at the King's deadline with their hands empty; they need a good story, or else they will not be able to continue being a storyteller, their life's passion. How will they get out of this one?

How to play:
Left Click: Interact, click to move
Escape: Options, including a setting for font legibility

February, 2023
